plot: The archive cine journals about the bombing of Piazza Fontana in Rome re edited in a short documentary to live again the hours after the dramatic night that change the history of Italy forever.
plot_es: The archive cine journals about the bombing of Piazza Fontana in Rome re edited in a short documentary to live again the hours after the dramatic night that change the history of Italy forever.
plot_en: The archive cine journals about the bombing of Piazza Fontana in Rome re edited in a short documentary to live again the hours after the dramatic night that change the history of Italy forever.
